messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Crimson Caper Conundrum DATE: 12/12/56 The courtroom was charged with a palpable tension as the trial got underway. The prosecution summoned the officers integral to the investigation to testify. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Adams, the main investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Adams. Can you narrate the events on the night the caper was discovered? WITNESS: Certainly. On the night of July 7th, Officer C. D. Baker noticed a break-in at the Crimson Museum and reported it. We initiated the investigation promptly. PROSECUTOR: Who handled the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Clark and Technician G. H. Davis were in charge of the forensic examination. PROSECUTOR: Who led the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Evans and K. L. Foster carried out the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense embarked on a cross-examination of Captain Adams concerning the investigative methods employed. During the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Gray, O. P. Harris, and Q. R. Ingram were also called to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
